minitweaks.rule.allChargedCreeperHeadsDr: All mobs killed by a charged creeper drop their head instead of only one
minitweaks.rule.commandSeed.extra.0: ops/2 for only ops, true/0 for anyone
minitweaks.rule.creeperBlockDamage.desc: Set creeper explosion block damage type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
minitweaks.rule.creeperBlockDamage.extra: break: all broken blocks are dropped (like tnt)
destroy: broken blocks are sometimes dropped (like default creepers)
minitweaks.rule.deathItemsDespawnMinutes: How many minutes it takes for a player's items to despawn after death
-1 for infinte, 0 for instant despawn, max value 32
minitweaks.rule.disableBlazeFire.desc: Disables fire made from blaze fireballs
minitweaks.rule.disableGhastFire.desc: Disables fire made from ghast fireballs
minitweaks.rule.dispensersBucketMobs.des: Dispensers can pick up bucketable mobs
Dispensers feed golden apples to zombie villagers with weakness
Note: dispensers curing a villager does not lower the villager's prices due to gossips being player-specific
minitweaks.rule.dispensersDyeMobs.desc: Dispensers can dye sheep (and shulkers if dyeableShulkers is enabled)
minitweaks.rule.dispensersNameMobs.desc: Dispensers use name tags on mobs
minitweaks.rule.dispensersRepairGolems.d: Dispensers can repair Iron Golems with iron ingots
minitweaks.rule.dragonBlockDamage.desc: Set dragon block damage breaking type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
destroy: broken blocks are destroyed and not dropped
minitweaks.rule.echoShardsEnableShrieker: Using an echo shard on a sculk shrieker allows it to summon wardens
minitweaks.rule.ghastBlockDamage.desc: Set ghast explosion block damage type, regardless of mobGriefing gamerule
minitweaks.rule.ghastBlockDamage.extra.2: break: all broken blocks are dropped (like tnt)
minitweaks.rule.ghastBlockDamage.extra.3: destroy: broken blocks are sometimes dropped (like default creepers)
Allows infinity and mending to stack on bows, like in 1.9 to 1.11
minitweaks.rule.lightningGlowifiesSquids: Squids struck by lightning convert to glow squids
minitweaks.rule.maxPlayerXpDrop.desc: Maximum amount of xp players drop on death
minitweaks.rule.mobItemPickup.desc: Overwrites random default pickup chance when mob spawns
minitweaks.rule.mobItemPickup.extra.0: Only zombie and skeleton type mobs are affected
minitweaks.rule.mobItemPickup.extra.3: never: mobs don't pick up items
minitweaks.rule.mobsDropNametag.desc: Named mobs drop their name tag on death
minitweaks.rule.mobsDropNametag.extra.0: Note: mobs will drop a name tag even if they weren't named with one
minitweaks.rule.mobsDropNametag.extra.1: This may also cause name tags to be able to be duped
minitweaks.rule.moveableWaterloggedBlock: Waterlogged blocks stay waterlogged when moved with a piston
Prevents farmland from being trampled if you have feather falling
minitweaks.rule.noRepairCost.desc: Removes additional cost for using an item in an anvil multiple times
minitweaks.rule.noVillagerWitchConversio: Villagers don't convert to witches when struck by lightning
minitweaks.rule.phantomSpawningTime.desc: Amount of ticks before Phantoms start having a chance to spawn
minitweaks.rule.protectionStacking.desc: Allows all the different protection types to stack on the same piece of armor, like in 1.14 to 1.14.2
minitweaks.rule.quickHarvesting.desc: Right click crops with a hoe to harvest and replant
minitweaks.rule.removableCurses.desc: Curses are also removed when using grindstones or repair crafting
minitweaks.rule.renewableDragonEgg.desc: Dragon eggs will always be placed on the portal after defeating the dragon
minitweaks.rule.renewableRawOres.desc: An anvil landing on Iron/Gold/Copper blocks turns them into the raw ore block version
minitweaks.rule.shaveSnowLayers.desc: Snow layers can be shaved, removing one layer, when right clicked with a shovel
minitweaks.rule.slimeLooting.desc: Bigger slimes spawn more smaller slimes when killed with looting
minitweaks.rule.slimeLooting.extra.0: Additional slimes can be up to as many levels of looting as you have (up to +3 with looting 3, etc)
minitweaks.rule.vexesNerf.desc: Vexes will start to die after the evoker that summoned them dies
minitweaks.rule.villagersAlwaysConvert.d: Villagers will always convert to Zombie Villagers when killed by a zombie, even on easy and normal difficulty
minitweaks.rule.villagersExplodeBeds.des: Villagers cause explosions when trying to use beds in the nether or end, like players
minitweaks.rule.villagersExplodeBeds.ext: "But why?" Idk, it's just a funny idea I had
